section.title: Deploying a system in a virtual network
section.para: You can also deploy a system in a network of virtual machines, which is useful for testing:

The disnixos-vm-env command is almost similar to the disnix-env command, except that it generates and launches a network of virtual machine instances. Moreover, this command cannot be used to upgrade a system.
